isis.stitle: FRONT DRIVE AXLE WHEEL ENDS: ROCKWELL - DISASSEMBLY - BEARING CUPS AND OIL SEAL FROM HUB

svcproc.title: BEARING CUPS AND OIL SEAL FROM HUB

step1.para: Remove the wheel (rim and tire) from the hub.
To disassemble the drum from the hub, remove the flat head capscrews from the drum.
If necessary to remove the wheel studs from the hub, put the hub in a press with the drum side on top. Press the studs through the hub.

note.para: If a press is not available, use a brass hammer or drift.

warning.para: Do not hit the wheel studs with a steel hammer or remove the studs by twisting. Damage to the parts can occur and metal fragments can cause injury.

step1.para: If necessary, remove the oil seal from the hub with a long screwdriver. Discard the old seal ( Figure 5).

figure.caption: Figure 5. Removing Oil Seal from Hub

step1.para: Remove the inner bearing cone from the hub.
Remove the inner and outer bearing cups from the hub with a press and sleeve or a bearing puller.
Remove the oil seal sleeve from the spindle.
